item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Damian Rajca. Welcome on my personal web page! I’m software engineer with a passion to know how things work. Education Technical university of Wroclaw Department of IT and Management. Computer Science - Master’s degree Technical university of Czestochowa, Department of mechanical engineering and computer science. Computer Science, specialization: systems and networks Languages Polish: native English: advanced Below you can find toys that I have worked with, or I’m working currently.
